title: Athletes
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 27 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR100L
description: Athletes introduces students to the competitive world of women and men who demonstrate strength, speed, and skill through various physical activities. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text.
meta: athletes, dive, ride, swim, throw, win
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast ideas
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word some

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
